Module io.helidon.integrations.oci.connect

Package io.helidon.integrations.oci.connect

Classes needed for OCI to connect to service API.
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    OciConfigProvider
    Provider of data needed to connect to OCI, and to use its APIs.
    OciSignatureData
    Data needed to sign requests.
    SessionKeys
    Provider of session keys when using Instance principal security.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    OciConfigInstancePrincipal
    OCI connectivity configuration based on instance principal.
    OciConfigInstancePrincipal.Builder
    Fluent API builder for OciConfigInstancePrincipal.
    OciConfigProfile
    OCI configuration required to connect to a service over REST API.
    OciConfigProfile.Builder
    Fluent API builder for OciConfigProfile.
    OciConfigResourcePrincipal
    OCI connectivity configuration based on resource principal.
    OciRequestBase<T extends OciRequestBase<T>>
    A base for OCI requests that acts as a builder.
    OciResponseParser
    Utility methods for processing OCI JSON responses.
    OciRestApi
    OCI specific REST API.
    OciRestApi.Builder
    Fluent API builder for OciRestApi.
    OciRestException.Builder
    Fluent API builder for OciRestException.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    OciRestApi.ConfigType
    How to connect to OCI.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    OciApiException
    OCI integration exception.
    OciRestException
    Exception used when OCI REST call returned and we have HTTP status and headers, and possibly an entity.
